title: Front End Developer
blurb: Front End Developer at a Product-Analytics software company based in Raleigh
points: Maintained an internal components library used by a wide, international team of engineers.
Ran accessibility audits and lead work to improve site accessibility.
Provided internal developer support by building out documentation and working with developers to improve their experience with the components library.

title: Front End Developer
blurb: Front End Developer at an Austin-based startup
points: Improved client UX experience by revamping legacy AngularJS views to VueJS with improved UX experiences.
Reduced code risk by leveraging Vue Test Utils, Jest, Mocha, and Chai to build test infrastructure against previously untested code.

title: Associate Software Developer - Middleware
blurb: JavaScript Developer at an Austin-based startup
points: Developed JavaScript software integrations to provide several large CRMs, such as Salesforce and Infusionsoft.
Produced secure login experiences by building integrations with OAuth functionality, from Google OAuth to client-specific OAuth implementations.
